name: Flower Garden
description:
“It’s a shooter…!”
“It’s a strategy…!”
“It’s a platformer…!”  
No, no—it’s a puzzle game!

You are a landscape architect, tending to a resplendent estate with beautiful gardens. But those gardens need watering!

Your task is to connect the pipes of the sprinkler system to ensure that every thirsty plant gets its due. After all, as an employee of the venerable Flower Garden Company, you live by the company’s motto: "You can do as you please... and we will take care of the flowers in your garden."

The game was created for the Great Spring Game Jam 2021.

Controls:
Mouse - click, drag and drop.
